channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 13th May
item.description:
PLEASE CUT BACK HEDGE TO BOUNDARY AND REMOVE DEBRIS FROM FOOTWAY 40m APROX 2 WAY TRAFFIC LIGHTS NOT MARKED (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sinkhole emerging on kerb / road, 13th May
item.description:
Outside 30 Albert Place a hole has started to grow which drops at least 6/7ft under the road. Looks potentially very dangerous. White markings have been made close by but when this was done there wasnâ€™t a hole. Over the last 2 weeks the hole has grown bigger.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 30, Albert Place, Marle Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Other damage to pavement i.e. cobbles, raised mound/surface

item.title: Road markings on St Georges Drive before going into St Georges Close needs replacing as the "private parking" is no longer visible, 13th May
item.description:
On St Georges Drive just before going into St Georges Drive there is a road marking that cannot be visible saying "private parking" Please can this be redone? I've double checked and St Georges Drive is a road that is managed by the council.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 13, Queens Retreat, Alstone, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road markings, lines and stud issues
